user.title: Akuvox SmartPlus Setup
user.description: Select a sign-in method to connect to your SmartPlus Account:

menu_options.sms_sign_in: SMS Verification (you will be signed out from your mobile app)
menu_options.app_tokens: App Token (you will remain signed in, but requires advanced steps)

sms_sign_in.title: SMS Verification
sms_sign_in.description: Please enter your mobile phone number to receive a verification SMS:

error.sms_send_failure: Failed to send SMS code. Please check your phone number and try again.

app_tokens.title: Sign In via App Tokens
app_tokens.description: Please enter in the following (review the documentation for guidance):

error.sign_in_failure: Failed to sign in. Please check your details and try again.

verify_sms_code.title: SMS Code Verification
verify_sms_code.description: Please enter the SMS code you received.

data_description.sms_code: It may take up to 60 seconds to receive the SMS.

error.invalid_code: Invalid SMS code. Please enter the correct code.

init.title: Replace User Token
init.description:
Enter your SmartPlus app user's token to allow Home Assistant to communicate with Akuvox's servers whilst remaining signed in on your device.

Refer to the documentation for instructions on how to extract your token string.

errors.base: Unable to retreive device list with the specified token.
